div.p: - - - entered against my father, Herakleides, son of Maron, who became a keeper of the public archives in the Arsinoite nome in the 10th year of the deified Trajan, together with Patron, son of Euangelos. - - - I cede the half due to me in the whole heritage of my aforesaid father in order not to be worried about the penalties. (Subscription of Herakleides-Valerius). Translation: B.A. van Groningen, P.Fam. Tebt. 17
